p: SARS-CoV-2 is now growing as a potential emerging pandemic [ 8, 9]. The lessons learned from earlier SARS-CoV-2 and MERS-CoV threats, recent and past epidemics and pandemics situations of Ebola, Zika, Nipah, swine flu, avian/bird flu led to make tremendous advances in science and research for developing suitable vaccines. Therapeutics/drugs, which along with the current research advances on COVID-19, are warranted to be explored optimally [ 19, 48, 91, 96â€“ 105]. The novel coronavirus is spreading rapidly from human to human with a wide range of clinical symptoms like fever, cough, myalgia, and fatigue with pneumonia [ 25, 40, 87]. To overcome the symptoms of novel coronavirus pneumonia, as per the severity of the patient, sedatives, analgesics, oxygen therapy, and ventilator facility should be provided [ 36, 106].
